Whenever Salt Road Exile dies or a creature you control scavenges it, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
Scavenge {3}{B}{B} [i]({3}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card’s power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)[/i]
